Professional Interests 
 
Joint replacement surgery especially in complex primary and revision 
surgeries of hip and knee. 
 
Management of Orthopedic Trauma especially Pelvic/Acetabular and 
Peri-articular Fractures. 
 
Degenerative and Traumatic spine disorders. 
 
Paediatric Orthopedic disorders and deformity correction. 
 
Peripheral Vascular Injuries. 
 
Arthroscopic Surgeries of Knee. 
 
Hobbies

Badminton.
